title: 35. My Tan Is Fake But My License is Real: Tanning Bed Confessions, The Vitamin D Myth, Tips For A Sun-Safe Summer + My Personal Favorite SPFs!
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode, I want to talk about a topic I'm very passionate about: limiting sun exposure. 

This episode includes:

- My history with tanning + why I'm at risk for skin cancer

- Sun protection tips

- The 2 types of sun exposure to be aware of

- Why I have "beef" with influencers that promote tanning (I'm mostly kidding, but I don't think it's responsible influencing)

- My Fav SPFs

- Why we need to #rethinksummer and consider other ways to enjoy our time on vacation without romanticizing the sun 

You can shop my Glymed store here

products mentioned:

Neova SPF (Use code TESSA15 for 15% off)
